mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.fans_num AS "fansNum", a.gender AS "gender", a.imgs AS "imgs", a.shop_plate AS "shopPlate", a.title AS "title", a.user_plate AS "userPlate", a.price AS "price", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.status AS "status", a.offer_template_id AS "offerTemplateId", a.user_id AS "userId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.enable_flag AS "enableFlag"
mapper.select: select b.wx_name as 'wxName', b.avatar_url as 'headPic', a.title as 'offerTitle', a.imgs as 'offerPic', a.fans_num as 'fanNums', a.price as 'price', a.id as 'id', c.offersTag as 'tag' from ho_offers a left join ho_user_basic b on a.user_id = b.id left join ( select a.offer_id as 'offerId', GROUP_CONCAT(b.dict_value) as 'offersTag', GROUP_CONCAT(b.id) as 'offersTagId' from ho_offer_tag a left join ho_dict b on b.id =a.dict_id group by a.offer_id ) c on c.offerId=a.id where 1=1 and a.status='3' order by a.create_date desc

select b.wx_name as 'wxName', b.avatar_url as 'headPic', a.shop_plate as 'shopPlate', a.user_plate as 'starPlate', a.fans_num as 'fanNums', a.title as 'offerTitle', a.remarks as 'remarks', a.imgs as 'offerPic', a.status as 'status' from ho_offers a left join ho_user_basic b on a.user_id=b.id where a.id=#{id}

select a.id as 'id', c.avatar_url as 'headPic', c.wx_name as 'wxName', a.title as 'title', a.fans_num as 'fansNum', z.tags as 'tags' from ho_offers a left join ho_snatch_offer b on a.id=b.offer_id left join ho_user_basic c on c.id=a.user_id left join ( select a.offer_id as 'offerId' ,GROUP_CONCAT(b.dict_value) as 'tags' from ho_offer_tag a left join ho_dict b on a.dict_id=b.id group by a.offer_id ) z on z.offerId=a.id where b.user_id=#{starUserId}
and a.status='LK'
and a.status in ('FN','CO')
order by b.create_date desc

select a.id as 'id', b.wx_name as 'wxName', b.avatar_url as 'headPic', a.imgs as 'pic', a.fans_num as 'fansNum', c.title as 'title', z.tags as 'tags',
b.phone_no as 'phoneNo', b.id as 'starIds',
a.status as 'status' from ho_offers a
left join ho_user_basic b on a.user_id=b.id
left join ho_snatch_offer d on d.offer_id = a.id and d.if_select='1' left join ho_user_basic b on b.id=d.user_id
left join ho_offer_template c on c.id=a.offer_template_id left join ( select a.offer_id as 'offerId' ,GROUP_CONCAT(b.dict_value) as 'tags' from ho_offer_tag a left join ho_dict b on a.dict_id=b.id group by a.offer_id ) z on z.offerId=a.id where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.status=#{type} order by a.create_date desc
